Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

I have posted the trailer for a series coming next Friday called Rocket Science Advanced (Rocket Science 101 was taken by NASA). It is part science/math to explain the critical design challenges in various areas of the world's space programs.  This uses Real Solar System, Realism Overhaul, and Real Progression Zero to add more realism to simulations.  Roughly half the episodes are flight/gameplay and half are science-tech oriented (with some engineering thrown in).

I hope you like it.

Parallax59

PS. It is very expensive to license other's music for videos, so I wrote my own music.

https://youtu.be/yuv5_wO-lDQ
